overview: A collection of 3 short films, "Princess Emiluma", "The Story of Srebrenica" and "Bob the Blob", made on Amiga by a woman known as Nanny Lynn. Initially made to entertain her grandkids, copies of the films spread via bootlegged tapes and sparked curiosity throughout Web 1.0 as to the influences and identity of Nanny Lynn.
title: The Films of Nanny Lynn
